pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easy Manipulation of IDEAM's Climatological Data // Time series plain text conversion and data visualization. It allows to transform IDEAM (Instituto de Hidrologia, Meteorologia y Estudios Ambientales) daily series from plain text to CSV files or data frames in R. Additionally, it is possible to obtain exploratory graphs from times series. IDEAMs data is freely delivered under formal request through the official web page http://www.ideam.gov.co/solicitud-de-informacion.
